channel.title: Learning the Java language through Stanford Lecturing
channel.description:
Hello, this link im going to post below is Learning Java through lectures, this was a real class CS106A at Stanford University CS(Computer Science) 106 A(Accelerated) This is all java coding, he lectures to the class in many different sections/lecture videos for everyone to see how to code java. He uses a program called Karel the Robot to help you at first. I am on video 2 now, will probably do 2 videos in the morning and 2 videos at night until im done. Hopefully this will help you in coding with java! Enjoy :P
All credits go out to Stanford University http://www.youtube.com/watch?index=0&feature=PlayList&p=84A56BC7F4A1F852&hl=uk&v=KkMDCCdjyW8&gl=US
